Zhongrui Wang

I am a third year master's student at the School of Atmospheric Sciences, Nanjing University, where I am advised by Prof. Lili Lei. I work on ensemble-based data assimilation and machine learning applications. More broadly, I am interested in Bayesian inference, probablistic machine learning, chaos dynamics, predictability, and anything theoretically beautiful.

I can be reached by zrwang[at]smail.nju.edu.cn.

CV  /  Google Scholar  /  Twitter  /  Github

Zhongrui Wang, Haohao Sun, Lili Lei, and Zhe-Min Tan

Lili Lei, Zhongrui Wang, and Zhe-Min Tan
